dublin_core.dcvalue: The feasibility of using an electronic device to self monitor diet and fluid intake was assessed using the treatment implementation model The three patients on hemodialysis who participated in this pilot study were asked to self monitor diet and fluid intake for 12 weeks with a personal digital assistant The intervention was delivered as intended however participants reported problems with usability and compliance to self monitoring was lower than desirable Further adjustments to the intervention will be made before testing efficacy
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T15:51:00Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2007-03-09
Nephrology nursing journal : journal of the American Nephrology Nurses' Association
Feasibility of using a personal digital assistant to self-monitor diet and fluid intake: a pilot study.
